item.title: Deciding What To Build NEXT?
item.description: Reposted from my original post Medium Deciding What To Build NEXT? – HelloMeets – Medium Product Managers are an interesting lot. Talk to any PM about their product and they would have a hundreds of different ideas about features they want to add to their product.
